setupZoom() - Method in class main.view.MainView
Sets the Scroll event, split into 4 cases: - Zoomed at base-camera-position/already in negative Zoom - Zoom further in - Zoom further out - Zoomed in already - Zoom further in - Zoom further out In the ViewHelper we simply keep track of our scales/tickmarks so we can adjust the applied scales/tickmarks on the View accordingly.
